amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 117-71 to require the Secretary of the Department of Labor and the Chair of the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission to conduct a study to determine the number of older adult women who may have been adversely impacted by age discrimination as a motivating factor in workplace discrimination or employment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis, Rodney amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A004) pursuant to the rule.
Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Davis, Rodney.

Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Davis, Rodney amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
